H3.text: where did melba beals live. Arkansas

A4.text: Beals was part of the Little Rock Nine, a group of black students who integrated Little Rock Central High School in Little Rock, Arkansas.

A5.text: Beals attended Horace Mann High School in Little Rock, Arkansas, an all-black high school.
